news.markdown:
**HURRAH! Brighton Festival Announcement!**
We will be performing in this years Festival, with Kate Tempest as Guest Director! It's a double bill of **_"It's okay, I'm dealing with it."_**  and **_May-We-Go-Round?_**. We'll also be leading a weekly workshop throughout May for 16–25 year olds, leading to the creation of a **curtain raiser** for our show, as well as an open workshop for all levels. [**Tickets**](http://brightonfestival.org/event/11025/may-we-go-round/) 

**Arts Council Success**
We are delighted to have received our fourth Arts Council Grant for the Arts to support development of our new show**_ "It's okay, I'm dealing with it._"** and for further touring of **_May-We-Go-Round?_** Here's to a very exciting and busy 2017... We start the year off with a a two week residency at [Dance Base](http://www.dancebase.co.uk/teachers/the-hiccup-project-100000589) working on **"It's okay, I'm dealing with it"**

We’ll also be leading a weekly workshop throughout May for 16–25 year olds, leading to the creation of a curtain raiser for our show, as well as an open workshop for all levels. Tickets

Arts Council Success
We are delighted to have received our fourth Arts Council Grant for the Arts to support development of our new show “It’s okay, I’m dealing with it.“ and for further touring of May-We-Go-Round? Here’s to a very exciting and busy 2017… We start the year off with a a two week residency at Dance Base working on “It’s okay, I’m dealing with it”

events.markdown:
**_May-We-Go-Round?_ Autumn Performances**
**22nd September** -- Swindon Dance -- **[Tickets](http://www.swindondance.org.uk/event/the-hiccup-project-may-we-go-round/)**
**23rd September** - Merlin Theatre, Frome -- **[Tickets](http://www.merlintheatre.co.uk/whats-on/performances/?page=2)**

**_"It's okay, I'm dealing with it._" Autumn Tour**
**15-16th November** --- The Wardrobe Theatre, Bristol --- **[Tickets](http://thewardrobetheatre.com/livetheatre/okay-im-dealing/)**
**17th November** -- Bath Spa Live, Bath Spa University  -- ** [Tickets](https://www.bathspalive.com/Online/default.asp)**
**18-19 November** -- Camden People's Theatre -- ** [Tickets](https://www.cptheatre.co.uk/production/its-okay-im-dealing-with-it/)**
